forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers this morning, then mostly cloudy with light rain possible this afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower is possible early. Overcast. Low 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a few showers early. A steady, soaking rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a few showers early. A steady, soaking rain developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 65F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 67F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 65F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
